title: Seven-Colored Puppeteer
name: ALICE MARGATROID
ability_description:
Alice does not need to discard Powerup cards when she loses life.

On her turn, Alice may discard an Item card she controls from play to activate her Spell Card. You can only activate one Spell Card per round.
spell_card_description:
Flip cards from the top of the deck until you reveal an Item card, then put that card into play. Put all other cards revealed this way into the discard pile.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Fairy of the Ice
name: CIRNO
ability_description:
Cirno has +2 Range.

Players at a distance of 1 from Cirno are not considered in range if there are two or more other players. She may still attack a player by going around the circle.
spell_card_description:
Attack a player in range. They must skip their next turn.

Players cannot skip two turns in a row, but you may still target them.

title: Shrine Maiden of Paradise
name: HAKUREI REIMU
ability_description: Players must discard an additional card in order to play a Dodge card against Reimu’s attacks.
spell_card_description:
Choose Danmaku, Dodge, Invocation, or Item cards. Until your next turn, players cannot play cards of the chosen type.

You may attack a player in range.

title: The Sealed Great Magician
name: HIJIRI BYAKUREN
ability_description: Whenever another player attacks, Byakuren may discard a Danmaku card. If she does, she attacks the attacker, regardless of range.
spell_card_description:
You gain +5 Range and +5 Distance until your next turn.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Young Mistress of Bhavagra
name: HINANAWI TENSHI
ability_description: Tenshi may draw an additional card each time she loses life.
spell_card_description:
Gain 1 life. You cannot go above your max life.

Choose another player, regardless of range. Starting with that player, you and the chosen player take turns discarding Danmaku cards until one player passes. That player loses 1 life. This does not count as an attack.

title: Colorful Rainbow Gatekeeper
name: HONG MEILING
ability_description:
During other players’ turns, Meiling’s max hand size is 7.

Meiling may choose to skip her turn. When Meiling skips her turn, she may draw four cards. You cannot skip two turns in a row.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when another player attacks.

Draw two cards.

Attack the attacker, regardless of range.

title: Free-Spirited Oni
name: IBUKI SUIKA
ability_description:
Suika has +1 Range.

Suika can play one additional Danmaku card per round.
spell_card_description:
Choose a number from 1 to 5. Until your next turn, all players use that number as the distance to each other, ignoring other modifiers.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Perfect and Elegant Maid
name: IZAYOI SAKUYA
ability_description: Sakuya can play two additional Danmaku cards per round.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when any player is attacked.

That player avoids the attack. Attack the attacker, regardless of range.

Additional Action cards may not be played this turn.

title: History-Eating Half Beast
name: KAMISHIRASAWA KEINE
ability_description: During Keine’s draw step, she draws an additional card, then puts any card from her hand on the top or the bottom of the deck.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when another player plays an Action card or activates an Action Spell Card.

Cancel that card.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Aquatic Engineer
name: KAWASHIRO NITORI
ability_description:
Nitori has +1 Distance.

On her turn, Nitori may discard an Item card she controls from play to draw a card.
spell_card_description:
Choose a player. Until your next turn, Item cards they control have no effect.

You may attack that player if they are in range.

title: Flower Master of the Four Seasons
name: KAZAMI YUUKA
ability_description: When Yuuka damages another player, she may draw a card.
spell_card_description: Attack all other players, regardless of range.

title: Ordinary Magician
name: KIRISAME MARISA
ability_description: During her draw step, Marisa may choose to draw one less card. If she does, she may gain control of any Item card in play.
spell_card_description: Attack a player in range. This attack deals 1 damage, plus 1 damage for each Powerup card you have in play.

title: Newbie Goddess of the Mountain
name: KOCHIYA SANAE
ability_description:
When Sanae plays a Danmaku card, she may look at the top card of the deck.

If she does, she may place that card back on the top of the deck, into the discard pile, or into another player’s hand.
spell_card_description:
Choose a player in range. That player must reveal their hand.

Attack that player once, then attack them once for each Danmaku card revealed this way beyond the first.

title: The Girl Even the Evil Spirits Fear
name: KOMEIJI SATORI
ability_description:
When Satori is attacked, she may flip the top card of the deck. If that card is a Winter, she avoids the attack.

Satori may look at any player’s hand once per round.
spell_card_description: Choose another player’s character and activate their Spell Card as if it were your own. You may choose a defeated player’s character.

title: Half-Human Half-Phantom Gardener
name: KONPAKU YOUMU
ability_description: When Youmu plays a Danmaku card, she may attack an additional different player in range.
spell_card_description:
Until your next turn, all players are considered in range for you.

Attack a player. You may also attack an additional different player.

title: Shikaisen from Ancient Japan
name: MONONOBE NO FUTO
ability_description:
Futo does not need to discard Powerup cards when she loses life.

When Futo is attacked, she may discard an Item card she controls from play to avoid the attack.
spell_card_description:
You may choose two other players and force them to swap hands.

You may attack a player in range.

title: The Unmoving Great Library
name: PATCHOULI KNOWLEDGE
ability_description:
Patchouli’s max hand size 7.

Patchouli starts the game with seven cards in her hand.
spell_card_title: Fire Water Wood Metal Earth Sign
spell_card_description:
Draw 2 cards.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Lunatic Moon Rabbit
name: REISEN UDONGEIN INABA
ability_description:
When a player avoids one of Reisen’s attacks, Reisen may attack another, different player in range.

Use this ability only once per card played.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when another player plays a Danmaku card or activates a Spell Card.

Cancel that card. You may copy that card with new targets.

title: Scorching, Troublesome Divine Flame
name: REIUJI UTSUHO
ability_description: During her turn, Utsuho may discard two cards to activate her Spell Card. You can only activate one Spell Card per round.
spell_card_description:
Choose a player in range. Attack that player three times.

You lose 1 life.

title: The Scarlet Devil
name: REMILIA SCARLET
ability_description: When Remilia avoids an attack, she may draw a card.
spell_card_description:
This Spell Card cannot be canceled.

Attack a player regardless of range.
This attack cannot be avoided.

title: Traditional Reporter of Fantasy
name: SHAMEIMARU AYA
ability_description: Once per turn, Aya may discard a Danmaku card to cancel any Danmaku card as it is being played.
spell_card_description:
Reveal the top five cards of the deck. Place any Danmaku cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into the discard pile.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Shoutoku Taoist
name: TOYOSATOMIMI NO MIKO
ability_description:
During her turn, Miko may give another player any number of cards from her hand.

Whenever Miko’s hand is empty, she may immediately activate her Spell Card. You can only activate one Spell Card per round.
spell_card_description:
Choose a player. That player must discard their hand and draw three cards.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Brain of the Moon
name: YAKOGORO EIRIN
ability_description: Eirin may play Reaction, Item, and Healing cards on behalf of other players.
spell_card_description:
Gain 1 life. You may have another player of your choice gain 1 life. You cannot go above your max life.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Youkai of Boundaries
name: YAKUMO YUKARI
ability_description: When Yukari avoids an attack, she may attack a player in range.
spell_card_description:
Choose any player. You may look at their hand, then either take a card of your choice from it, or take an Item that player controls in play.

You may attack that player if they are in range.

title: Sister of the Devil
name: FLANDRE SCARLET
ability_description:
Players do not need to discard a Powerup card when they lose life to Flandre’s attacks.

When a player loses life to Flandre’s attack, she may force that player to discard an Item card they control of Flandre’s choice.
spell_card_description:
This Spell Card cannot be canceled.

Choose a player regardless of range. Attack that player and each player adjacent to them. You cannot attack yourself.

title: Human Form of Hourai
name: FUJIWARA NO MOKOU
ability_description:
If Mokou is hit by an attack, she may flip the top card of the deck.
If it is Spring or Summer, she does not lose life from that attack.
spell_card_description:
Choose a player in range.

If you are at max life, attack that player once.

Otherwise, if you are above 1 life, attack that player twice.

Otherwise, attack that player three times.

title: Bake-danuki of Ten Transformations
name: FUTATSUIWA MAMIZOU
ability_description:
At the start  of the game and at the start of her turn, Mamizou may discard a card from her hand to recruit an Extra Character if she doesn’t currently have one from this Ability. Mamizou gains the Ability and can activate the Spell Card of that Extra Character.

When Mamizou is attacked, she may dismiss this Extra Character to avoid the attack.
spell_card_description:
Draw a card.

If you have an Extra Character from any source, you may dismiss it and recruit a new one. The source does not change.

Attack a player in range.

title: Poker Face of Abundant Expressions
name: HATA NO KOKORO
ability_description:
When Kokoro plays a Danmaku or Invocation card, she may place it in another player’s hand instead of the discard pile after it resolves.

That card cannot be collected by incidents.
spell_card_description:
Flip the top three cards of the deck. For each card, you may perform an action according to its season.

Spring: Choose a player. They draw a card.
Summer: Attack a player in range.
Autumn: Force a player to discard a card of their choice from their hand.
Winter: Force a player to discard an Item card of your choice that they control.

title: Goddess of Hell
name: HECATIA LAPISLAZULI
ability_description:
When Hecatia is at max life, she may play two additional Danmaku cards per turn.

Otherwise, when Hecatia is above 1 life, she has +2 Range.

Otherwise, Hecatia has +2 Distance.
spell_card_description:
Choose three: (You cannot choose the same option more than once.)
• Draw a card.
• Choose another player. They draw a card.
• Discard a card and gain 1 life.
• Resolve the current incident.
• Attack a player in range.

title: Phantasmal Percussionist
name: HORIKAWA RAIKO
ability_description:
On her turn, Raiko may discard 3 points worth of cards from her hand to activate her Spell Card.

When Raiko activates her Spell Card using an NInvocation card, it cannot be canceled. This includes Extra Characters.
spell_card_description:
You may attack a player in range.

This attack deals damage equal to the number of consecutive rounds you have successfully activated "Pristine Beat," including this one.

title: The Storied Unexplainable Phenomenon
name: HOSHIGUMA YUUGI
ability_description:
Yuugi does not need to discard Powerup cards when she loses life.

When Yuugi would avoid an attack, she may choose to not avoid the attack. If she does, she may attack the attacker, regardless of range. If the attacker is in range, this attack cannot be avoided.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when you are attacked, or when you lose life.

Draw a card. Gain 1 life. You can’t go above your max life.

You may attack a player in range.

title: The Unidentified Fantastic Flying Girl
name: HOUJUU NUE
ability_description:
At the start of the game, Nue recruits two Extra Characters. At the end of each turn, if Nue lost life to an attack that turn, she dismisses those Extra Characters and recruits two new Extra Characters.

Nue gains the BAbilities of these Extra Characters. She cannot activate their Spell Cards.
spell_card_description:
Other players cannot activate this Spell Card.

Recruit two Extra Characters. These count as Extra Characters from Nue’s Ability. Then, dismiss two Extra Characters of your choice recruited by Nue’s Ability or Spell Card.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Eternal Princess
name: HOURAISAN KAGUYA
ability_description: At the start of Kaguya’s turn, flip the top card of the deck. If it is Autumn or Winter, Kaguya gains 1 life. You cannot go above your max life.
spell_card_description:
You may attack a player in range.

Then, you may discard your hand. If you do, take an extra turn after this one. You cannot take more than one extra turn in a row.

name: JUNKO
ability_description:
Junko may choose to treat cards from her hand as if they had 1 higher point value.

Junko can play one additional Danmaku card per round.
spell_card_description:
Reveal the top five cards of the deck. Choose any number of those cards with a combined point value of 5 or less and put those cards in your hand. Put the remaining cards in the discard pile.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Hell’s Traffic Accident
name: KAENBYOU RIN
ability_description:
During her draw step, Rin may choose to draw one fewer card. If she does, she may choose a playable card from the top three cards of the discard pile or collected by the current incident and put it into her hand.

Whenever another non-Mob player is defeated, Rin may draw two cards.

Whenever Rin activates "Vengeful Cannibal Spirit," she may attack a player in range.
spell_card_description:
Choose a defeated player’s character and activate their Spell Card as if it were your own.

Other players can’t activate this spell card. This can’t be activated if no player is defeated.

title: Counterattacking Amanojaku
name: KIJIN SEIJA
ability_description:
Seija can have any number of
Defense or Artifact cards in play
at a time.

At the start of the game, Seija may search any deck for an Artifact card, put it into play, then shuffle that deck.
spell_card_description:
Kijin Seija cannot be chosen as a target for this Spell Card.

Attack a player in range. If that player controls an Item card, this attack deals damage equal to the highest point value among Item cards that player controls.
Otherwise it deals 1 damage.

title: The Closed Eye of Love
name: KOMEIJI KOISHI
ability_description:
At the start of each player’s turn, Koishi may choose another player’s character. Until Koishi chooses a different character, Koishi copies that character’s Ability. Koishi may choose defeated players’ characters.

Koishi cannot copy BAbilities that recruit Extra Characters.
spell_card_description:
Choose another player. Until the start of your next turn, that player loses all BAbilities from their characters. This includes Extra Characters.

You may attack a player in range.

title: The Protecting Protected Great Ring
name: KUMOI ICHIRIN
ability_description: Players hit by Ichirin’s attacks draw one fewer card when they lose life from that attack.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when another player draws a card.

Attack that player twice, regardless of range.

title: The Pinnacle of Native Gods
name: MORIYA SUWAKO
ability_description:
Suwako has +1 Distance.

Once per turn, when Suwako draws cards, she may discard and redraw those cards.

When Suwako would flip a card, she may instead flip two cards and choose one.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when another player plays an Action or Reaction card.

Put that card into your hand instead
of the discard pile after it resolves.
That card cannot be collected by incidents.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Beautiful Scarlet Cloth
name: NAGAE IKU
ability_description: Once per turn, when another player plays an Action card, Iku may discard a card from her hand that shares a season with the card being played. If she does, cancel the card being played. This does not affect Spell Cards.
spell_card_description:
Choose two different seasons. Then, flip cards from the top of the deck until you flip a card of each of the chosen seasons. For each chosen season, put the first card revealed this way into your hand.

You may attack a player in range.

title: Ferryman of the Sanzu
name: ONOZUKA KOMACHI
ability_description:
During other players’ turns, Komachi’s max hand size is 7.

Komachi may choose to skip her turn.
When Komachi skips her turn, she may look at the top seven cards of the discard pile, then put three of her choice into her hand. You cannot skip two turns in a row.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when a player would avoid an attack.

They do not avoid the attack.

Attack that player regardless of range.

title: Ghost of Dreamland
name: SAGYOUJI YUYUKO
ability_description:
All players at 1 life are considered
in range for Yuyuko.

When Yuyuko attacks a player at
1 life, that attack cannot be avoided.
spell_card_description:
All other players lose 1 life.
This cannot reduce a player’s life below 1. This is not an attack.

title: Supreme Judge of Paradise
name: SHIKI EIKI, YAMAXANADU
ability_description:
At any time, Eiki may reveal her role card.

Eiki draws one additional card during her draw step if her role card is revealed.
spell_card_description:
Choose another player regardless of range and declare "black" or "white."

Secretly reveal a card in your hand to that player.
If you declared "black" and their role card matches the season of the revealed card, they lose 1 life.
If you declared "white" and their role card matches the season of the revealed card, they gain 1 life.
Otherwise they announce that nothing happens.

title: The Cheerful Forgotten Umbrella
name: TATARA KOGASA
ability_description: Once per turn, when a Spring card enters the discard pile, Kogasa may flip the top card of the deck. If it is an Action card, she may immediately play that card. This does not count against her Danmaku card limit.
spell_card_description:
Activate this when another player plays an Action card.

This Spell Card cannot be canceled.

Attack that player regardless of range. This attack cannot be avoided.

title: Disciple of Bishamonten
name: TORAMARU SHOU
ability_description:
Shou does not need to discard Powerup cards when she loses life.

When Shou gains control of an Item card, she may draw a card.
spell_card_description:
You may discard an Item card you control from play as you activate this.

Attack a player in range. If you discarded an Item card, this attack deals damage equal to the point value of that card. Otherwise, the attack deals 1 damage.

title: The Secret Sealing Club’s First President
name: USAMI SUMIREKO
ability_description:
Sumireko may announce a season before drawing a card from any deck to her hand.
If the drawn card matches that season, she may reveal it, then draw an extra card from the Main deck.

This Ability cannot be used on extra cards drawn this way.
spell_card_description:
Choose a player in range. That player must reveal their hand. Perform an action based on the highest point value revealed this way:

5 or greater: Attack that player three times.
3 — 4: Attack that player twice.
1 — 2: Attack that player once.
Otherwise: Attack that player once.

title: Shikigami of the Gap Youkai
name: YAKUMO RAN
ability_description:
At the start of the game, Ran recruits an Extra Character. Ran can activate the Spell Card of that Extra Character.
Ran does not gain that character’s Ability.

When Ran activates that Extra Character’s Spell Card, she may also activate "Banquet of Twelve Heavenly Generals," regardless of timing.
spell_card_description:
Choose one:
• Draw two cards.
• Discard a card and gain 1 life.
• Attack a player regardless of range.

title: Avatar of Mountains and Lakes
name: YASAKA KANAKO
ability_description:
Kanako has +1 Range.

At any time, once per round, Kanako may look at the top card of any deck, then put that card on the top or bottom of that deck.
spell_card_description:
Resolve the current incident.

Then, look at the top three cards of any deck and place them on the top or bottom of that deck in any order.

You may attack a player in range.
